item.title: GitHub Projects
item.description: A list of some my current GitHub projects

item.title: Self hosted LINE Notify From Email
item.description: This project is made of a few different components. Python module and scripts Docker configuration. Exim or Postfix configuration within docker. The basic idea is to be able to accept an email, process it and trigger a LINE message Notification. So I am looking to replace Zapier in a very small way.
